title: Supper strange lag cant find info anywhere
body: So recently when I've been playing I've been experiencing the weirdest lag. and its not mentioned anywhere. about once every two games I get about 30-50ms at a steady base line rate however about once a minute my ping shoots up to 800 and stays there but when i tab out and tab back in it then immediately corrects back to baseline. I'm talking about connectivity not FPS. no where have i ever seen this mentioned before and i am totally lost. i don't even think this should be a thing.

replies.body: Your network might be suffering from packet loss here, which would appear as your ping skyrocketing.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get a better overview of your case and figure out what's happening.  Let me know what you find!
